page.title: 17A Day of My Family's Life
page.content:
In the morning we got everything ready. Next we went to the church.When the coach came we got on the back seat.We went to Broadstairs.When we got there we walked to the beach.After we had unpacked,some of us went in the sea.Later we went on the swingboats.Then I bought a rubber with a tennis court on.We had a good time.For tea we went to a hall. After tea we played some games.Next we walked back to the coach.When we were all ready we got on. Then we went home. On the way home it rained.
By Keira (aged 10)
